text: When the bus stopped in the square for the free, promotional, drink distribution, the priest was giving catechism classes to a few children. Using his authority as the spiritual mentor, he imposed on the eager children the obligation to confess before they would succumb to the new sin of gluttony that was sweeping the country. We sat in the confessional; little by little, the cure was spreading to the group. I was the last one and when confession was over and I ran to the plaza, the coach had already left. FIN
title: Llega la coca cola a la aldea
author: José Saramago
